events.message: The customer reported an auto accident involving their vehicle on a wet road, requesting to file a claim for the damages sustained during the collision.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and the keywords indicating vehicle collision and damage.
An agent specializing in auto claims was assigned to handle the case, ensuring prompt communication with the customer and all parties involved.
The customer received acknowledgment from the company confirming that the auto accident claim had been officially registered and was under review.
To proceed with the assessment, the agent requested necessary documents including the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and the insurance policy details.
The customer submitted all requested documentation promptly, including official accident reports and images of the vehicle damage to facilitate claim processing.
A thorough investigation began to verify details of the collision, evaluate damage extent, and confirm liability as outlined by the claim details and supporting evidence.
The investigation concluded with findings supporting the claim’s validity and estimating repair costs within the policy coverage limits without discrepancies.
The insurer proposed a settlement offer based on the investigation results, detailing compensation amounts and next steps for vehicle repairs or replacements.
The customer responded with positive feedback expressing satisfaction with how the claim was handled and appreciating the timely communication throughout the process.
Following agreement on the settlement, the claim was officially approved, enabling the customer to proceed with repairs covered under the insurance policy terms.
The payment for auto repairs was processed and issued to the customer’s designated account to cover expenses as detailed in the approved settlement agreement.
The claim was formally closed after confirming that the customer completed vehicle repairs and all financial transactions related to the auto accident claim were settled.
